verses.text: And the \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: the \w rest|strong="H7605"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* also \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w lots|strong="H1486"\w*, to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w parts|strong="H3027"\w* \add to dwell\add* in \add other\add* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, that willingly \w offered|strong="H5068"\w* themselves to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

¶ Now these \add are\add* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w province|strong="H4082"\w* that \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: but in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* in his \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* in their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \add to wit\add*, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, and the \w Nethinims|strong="H5411"\w*, and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Solomon’s|strong="H8010"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.

And at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \add certain\add* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*. Of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; \w Athaiah|strong="H6265"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amariah|strong="H0568"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shephatiah|strong="H8203"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Mahalaleel|strong="H4111"\w*, of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Perez|strong="H6557"\w*;\f + \fr 11.4 \ft Perez: also called, Pharez\f*

And \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Col-hozeh|strong="H3626"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hazaiah|strong="H2382"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Adaiah|strong="H5718"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joiarib|strong="H3114"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shiloni|strong="H8023"\w*.

All the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Perez|strong="H6557"\w* that \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \add were\add* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*.

And these \add are\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*; \w Sallu|strong="H5543"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joed|strong="H3133"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Pedaiah|strong="H6305"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kolaiah|strong="H6964"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ithiel|strong="H0384"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jesaiah|strong="H3470"\w*.

And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him \w Gabbai|strong="H1373"\w*, \w Sallai|strong="H5543"\w*, \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w*.

And \w Joel|strong="H3100"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zichri|strong="H2147"\w* \add was\add* their \w overseer|strong="H6496"\w*: and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Senuah|strong="H5574"\w* \add was\add* \w second|strong="H4932"\w* over the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.
Of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*: \w Jedaiah|strong="H3048"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joiarib|strong="H3114"\w*, \w Jachin|strong="H3199"\w*.

\w Seraiah|strong="H8304"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Meraioth|strong="H4812"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahitub|strong="H0285"\w*, \add was\add* the \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* that \w did|strong="H6213"\w* the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \add were\add* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w*: and \w Adaiah|strong="H5718"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeroham|strong="H3395"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Pelaliah|strong="H6421"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amzi|strong="H0557"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Pashur|strong="H6583"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Malchiah|strong="H4441"\w*,

And his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w*: and \w Amashai|strong="H6023"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azareel|strong="H5832"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahasai|strong="H0273"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Meshillemoth|strong="H4919"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Immer|strong="H0564"\w*,

And their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*, an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w*: and their \w overseer|strong="H6496"\w* \add was\add* \w Zabdiel|strong="H2068"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \add one of\add* the great \w men|strong="H1419"\w*.\f + \fr 11.14 \ft the son…: or, the son of Haggedolim\f*

Also of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*: \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hashub|strong="H2815"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azrikam|strong="H5840"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hashabiah|strong="H2811"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bunni|strong="H1138"\w*;

And \w Shabbethai|strong="H7678"\w* and \w Jozabad|strong="H3107"\w*, of the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \add had\add* the oversight of the \w outward|strong="H2435"\w* \w business|strong="H4399"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 11.16 \ft had…: Heb. were over\f*

And \w Mattaniah|strong="H4983"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Micha|strong="H4316"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zabdi|strong="H2067"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*, \add was\add* the \w principal|strong="H7218"\w* to \w begin|strong="H8462"\w* the \w thanksgiving|strong="H3034"\w* in \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*: and \w Bakbukiah|strong="H1229"\w* the \w second|strong="H4932"\w* among his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and \w Abda|strong="H5653"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shammua|strong="H8051"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Galal|strong="H1559"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeduthun|strong="H3038"\w*.

All the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* in the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \add were\add* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w*.

Moreover the \w porters|strong="H7778"\w*, \w Akkub|strong="H6126"\w*, \w Talmon|strong="H2929"\w*, and their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* that \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, \add were\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w*.\f + \fr 11.19 \ft the gates: Heb. at the gates\f*

¶ And the \w residue|strong="H7605"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \add and\add* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \add were\add* in all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* in his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

But the \w Nethinims|strong="H5411"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Ophel|strong="H6077"\w*: and \w Ziha|strong="H6727"\w* and \w Gispa|strong="H1658"\w* \add were\add* over the \w Nethinims|strong="H5411"\w*.\f + \fr 11.21 \ft Ophel: or, the tower\f*

The \w overseer|strong="H6496"\w* also of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \add was\add* \w Uzzi|strong="H5813"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bani|strong="H1137"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hashabiah|strong="H2811"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Mattaniah|strong="H4983"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Micha|strong="H4316"\w*. Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*, the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w* \add were\add* \w over|strong="H5048"\w* the \w business|strong="H4399"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

For \add it was\add* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* concerning them, that a certain \w portion|strong="H0548"\w* should be for the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*, \w due|strong="H1697"\w* for every \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 11.23 \ft a certain…: or, a sure ordinance\f*

And \w Pethahiah|strong="H6611"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Meshezabeel|strong="H4898"\w*, of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \add was\add* at the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* in all \w matters|strong="H1697"\w* concerning the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 11.24 \ft Zerah: also called, Zarah\f*

And for the \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*, with their \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*, \add some\add* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Kirjath-arba|strong="H7153"\w*, and \add in\add* the \w villages|strong="H2691"\w* thereof, and at \w Dibon|strong="H1769"\w*, and \add in\add* the \w villages|strong="H1323"\w* thereof, and at \w Jekabzeel|strong="H3343"\w*, and \add in\add* the \w villages|strong="H1323"\w* thereof,
And at \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w*, and at \w Moladah|strong="H4137"\w*, and at \w Beth-phelet|strong="H1046"\w*,
And at \w Hazar-shual|strong="H2705"\w*, and at \w Beer-sheba|strong="H0884"\w*, and \add in\add* the \w villages|strong="H1323"\w* thereof,
And at \w Ziklag|strong="H6860"\w*, and at \w Mekonah|strong="H4368"\w*, and in the \w villages|strong="H1323"\w* thereof,
And at \w En-rimmon|strong="H5884"\w*, and at \w Zareah|strong="H6881"\w*, and at \w Jarmuth|strong="H3412"\w*,

\w Zanoah|strong="H2182"\w*, \w Adullam|strong="H5725"\w*, and \add in\add* their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*, at \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w*, and the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* thereof, at \w Azekah|strong="H5825"\w*, and \add in\add* the \w villages|strong="H1323"\w* thereof. And they \w dwelt|strong="H2583"\w* from \w Beer-sheba|strong="H0884"\w* unto the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of \w Hinnom|strong="H2011"\w*.

The \w children|strong="H1121"\w* also of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* from \w Geba|strong="H1387"\w* \add dwelt\add* at \w Michmash|strong="H4363"\w*, and \w Aija|strong="H5857"\w*, and \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, and \add in\add* their \w villages|strong="H1323"\w*,\f + \fr 11.31 \ft from: or, of\f*\f + \fr 11.31 \ft at: or, to\f*
\add And\add* at \w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w*, \w Nob|strong="H5011"\w*, \w Ananiah|strong="H6055"\w*,
\w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w*, \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*, \w Gittaim|strong="H1664"\w*,
\w Hadid|strong="H2307"\w*, \w Zeboim|strong="H6650"\w*, \w Neballat|strong="H5041"\w*,
\w Lod|strong="H3850"\w*, and \w Ono|strong="H0207"\w*, the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of \w craftsmen|strong="H2791"\w*.
And of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \add were\add* \w divisions|strong="H4256"\w* \add in\add* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \add and\add* in \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*.
